typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		city_id as string,
		city as string,
		country_id as string,
		last_update as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	wildcardPaths:['city.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source(output(
		country_id as string,
		country as string,
		last_update as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source2
source1, source2 join(source1@country_id == source2@country_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 aggregate(groupBy(country),
	city_count = count(city_id),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		Country = country,
		city_count
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
